root: ^This circus sure is amazing, I can't wait for the main show to begin!

c-1: ^Yes, it is truly to die for !
^There you get a chance to meet the circus director!
^I don't know how he does it, but he just makes me want to blindly follow orders. No questions asked!
c-2: ^Gambling? I don't see the fun in it.
^Especially when the dealer is rigging the cards!
^There is no way you can beat the house.

Question2: ^Can you tell me about the dealer?

c-0: ^Like I said, stay clear of the cards
^Focus on the dice, they are rigged to explode.
^But If you hit them just right, you can turn them against the Dealer.
^But what do I know, I am just a little kid.
